ambiguities.source_text: Create a field for the Email Subject and a field for the Email Body
e.g. Tom, the results are in, your secret santee is: Ellie. Good luck finding a great gift!
ambiguities.ref: email_body = f"{santa_name} the results are in your secret santee is: {santee_name}. Good luck finding a great gift!"

ambiguities.source_text: Some of the email addresses contain typos. Clean them up
